text: midneunjadeul-iyeo manh-eun aheuba leuwa luheubandeul-i bujeong-eulo salam ui jaemul-eul chugjeoghamyeo hananim-ui gil e issneun ideul-eul banghae hadoda ttohangeumgwa eun-eul jeojanghayeo dugo hananim eul wihae sayongchi anhneun jadeul-i iss-euni geudeul-ege gotongseuleoun beol-i iss eul geos-ila gyeong-gohala
